page.title: 18RECREATION FACILITIES.
page.content: The area has attracted many residents interested in country pursuits. These include walking, horse-riding, gardening and boating and fishing on the Wey Navigation. Sports facilities range from cricket and tennis to private swimming pools; nearby towns offer many more. Children have no special provision here except play groups and a play ground on Ripley Green, but they don't lack opportunities for recreation nearby. In Ockham there are regular Art classes, Bell-ringing and shooting. Residents are conservation minded and clearing footpaths is one leisure occupation.
